Text: Is this the full-length version?  The runtime indicated is only 165 minutes, but the link to blu-ray.com referenced states "Note: This Blu-ray release contains the complete five-and-a-half hour version of Carlos. "

I gave you the runtime, and also stated that it is the movie version. Also, if you check the blu-ray cover it clearly says "the movie and the trilogy". Also, the trilogy is 5.5hrs long and this file is only 6.5GB at a bitrate of 5.5mbps.

I'm impatient, but I get a lot of stupid questions. The evidence is before you.
